About.title: About AZERTY
About.description: We're passionate about technology and committed to helping you find the perfect computing solutions for your needs. From gaming enthusiasts to professional creators, we've got you covered.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do and shape how we serve our community
values.customer_description: Every decision we make is centered around providing the best possible experience for our customers.
values.innovation_description: We stay ahead of technology trends to bring you the latest and most advanced products.
values.quality_description: We rigorously test every product to ensure it meets our high standards before reaching you.
values.global_description: Serving customers worldwide with fast shipping and localized support in multiple languages.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.description: A decade of growth, innovation, and customer success
timeline.company_description: Started as a small computer repair shop with a vision to democratize technology access.
timeline.location_description: Opened our flagship store in Silicon Valley, becoming a local tech destination.
timeline.online_description: Launched our e-commerce platform, reaching customers nationwide.
timeline.custom_description: Introduced custom PC building services and gaming system specialization.
timeline.enterprise_description: Expanded into enterprise and professional workstation markets.
timeline.global_description: Now serving customers in over 50 countries with 24/7 support.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At AZERTY, we believe technology should empower everyone to achieve their goals.
mission.commitment: Our commitment goes beyond just selling products. We're your technology partners, offering expert advice, comprehensive support, and solutions tailored to your unique requirements.

cta.title: Ready to Join the AZERTY Family?

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to answer all your questions and help you find the perfect computing solutions for your needs.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Have questions about our products or need technical support? We're here to help! Reach out to our expert team and get the assistance you need.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Please provide details about your inquiry...

returnPolicy.question: What are your return policies?
returnPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all products with original packaging and receipt.

support.question: Do you offer technical support?
support.answer: Yes! Our expert technicians provide free technical support for all purchased products.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all financing options through our partners.
